short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes any mention of overused tech buzzwords appear sarcastic to remind you to take them with a pinch of salt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tech buzzwords like "machine learning", "big data", and "Internet of Things" are completely overused in the media and in job listings by people who have no idea what they really mean. This extension makes all mention of these buzzwords appear sarcastic to remind you that you should take them with a pinch of salt.

Full list:
"artificial intelligence",
"machine learning",
"deep learning",
"reinforcement learning",
"blockchain",
"data science",
"big data",
"internet of things",
"the cloud",
"cloud computing",
"cryptocurrency"
